setValue

public void setValue(double value,
                     int constraintOrder,
                     double slope)
setValue sets the aspect value. To be used on a Constrained task to set the aspect value to a value that will satisfy constraints

Specified by:
setValue in interface SettableConstraintEvent
Parameters:
value - the constraining value
constraintOrder - specifies whether the constrained value must be BEFORE (LESSTHAN), COINCIDENT (EQUALTO), or AFTER (GREATERTHAN) the constraining value. The score function of the preference is selected to achieve the constraint.
slope - specifies the rate at which the score function degrades on the allowed side of the constraint. The disallowed side always has a failing score.

setValue

public void setValue(double value)
setValue sets the aspect value. To be used on a Constrained task to set the aspect value to a value that will satisfy constraints

Specified by:
setValue in interface SettableConstraintEvent
Parameters:
value - the constraining value
